00077 {
00079     glm::mat4 lightProjMatrix = glm::perspective(90.0f, 1.0f, 1.0f, 1000.0f);
00080     glm::mat4 lightViewMatrix = glm::lookAt(l->GetPos(), glm::vec3(0.0), glm::vec3(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f) );
00081 
00082

00085     glBindBuffer(GL_UNIFORM_BUFFER, 0);
00086 
00088     glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, l->GetFBO());
00089 
00091     glCullFace(GL_FRONT);
00092     glColorMask(0, 0, 0, 0);      //disable colorbuffer write
00093     glClear(GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00094 
00095     //set viewport, draw scene
00096     glViewport(0, 0, l->ShadowSize(), l->ShadowSize());
00097     glEnable(GL_POLYGON_OFFSET_FILL);
00098 
00100     DrawSceneDepth("_mat_default_shadow", lightViewMatrix);
00101 
00102     //Finish, restore values
00103     glDisable(GL_POLYGON_OFFSET_FILL);
00104     glCullFace(GL_BACK);
00105     glColorMask(1, 1, 1, 1);
00106     glViewport(0, 0, m_resx, m_resy);         //reset viewport
00107 
00109     glm::mat4 shadowMatrix = biasMatrix * lightProjMatrix * lightViewMatrix * glm::inverse(m_viewMatrix);
00110 
00111     //restore projection matrix and set shadow matrices
00112     glBindBuffer(GL_UNIFORM_BUFFER, m_uniform_matrices);
00113     glBufferSubData(GL_UNIFORM_BUFFER, 0, sizeof(glm::mat4), glm::value_ptr(m_projMatrix));
00114     glBufferSubData(GL_UNIFORM_BUFFER, (l->GetOrd() + 1) * sizeof(glm::mat4), sizeof(glm::mat4), glm::value_ptr(shadowMatrix));
00115     glBindBuffer(GL_UNIFORM_BUFFER, 0);
00116 
00117     glBindFramebuffer(GL_FRAMEBUFFER, 0);
